description:
Kosuijin`s acid has ravaged Bunchu, but Kokukirin musters up the last of his strength to get both of them out of the paopei space. Meanwhile, Taikobo surmises that Kingo Island is about to fall and tells Yozen and the others to start preparing to escape. Taikobo then jumps on Supushan and takes off toward Bunchu. Carrying in his heart the deaths of Fugen, the Buseioh, the Twelve Elite Sennin, and so many others at Bunchu`s hand, Taikobo faces a battered and beaten Bunchu. With unwavering resolve, the two opponents begin the final battle. After an eternity, the Hoshin Project will reach its completion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oitaru Shouchou to Kaze no Bunki
Symbole vieillissant et vent du renouveau
老いたる象徴と風の分岐
